column2: This information is used to measure the number of visitors to the various sections of our site and identify system performance or problem areas. We also use this information to help us develop the site, analyze patterns of usage, and to make the site more useful.
purposes of research analysis
We use persistent cookies in two ways, both of which enhance your experience on USA.gov while also protecting your privacy:
to ensure we won't invite you to take a customer satisfaction survey within 90 days of completing a survey on USA.gov.
to understand how people are using the site and how we can make it better
used to help us better understand our visitors' interests and needs to more effectively develop content to serve you.
creates a much better experience for you
